title: Best of The Herd: 01/28/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/28/2019
description:
Colin doesn't blame Anthony Davis for wanting to leave New Orleans because he respects when athletes put winning over money.  He talks about where he was right and wrong in the past week including admitting he was a little wrong about Baker Mayfield.  Plus, Peter King of NBC Sports talks about why he is infuriated that Roger Goodell has not spoken publicly about the blown call at the end of the NFC Championship Game.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
